name: MouseHunt PuzzleTrap
description:
Enter the curious world of MouseHunt Puzzle Trap and defeat the elusive foe! Use your resolve, brains, and mad skills to win the day. With beautiful graphics, intuitive gameplay, fun animations and challenging levels, experience an epic game adventure.

Enchanted mice are everywhere in the land of Gnawnia and it’s your job to collect them all. Clear the squares to lead your mice to the target, but don’t block yourself in! It’s not as easy as it looks. As perplexing as it is fun!

Features:

● Interesting puzzles that are fun to play, but challenging to master.
● Multiple ways to match blocks and solve each puzzle.
● Different breeds of mysterious and fun mice to catch and collect.
● Filled with quirky and cute animations.
● Bonus levels with special features.
● Colourful world to explore as you venture thought the Kingdoms of Gnawnia, Burroughs and Furoma.

Can YOU catch all the mice? Let your hunt begin!
